extendedInfo.description: This is a plugin of 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)'.*** This app does not open on its own. ***Please first install the main app 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)' from Google Play before using this plugin:http://goo.gl/yuDqJor you can download from our homepagehttp://www.dailyyoga.comYoga for Body Toning II provides advanced session that will help you burn fats and build figure through comparatively tough warm-ups, stretching and balancing exercises. Through an overall training almost all your body parts will be covered to better your shape. This session advocates muscular endurance, attention focus and a basic knowledge of yoga skills.During the practice we utilize dynamic postures for physical activation. Besides traditional warm-ups, various limbs stretches and balancing postures, some basic inverted postures are also introduced to boost up your blood circulation and metabolism. Postures as Plow and Basic Fish will stimulate the organs in your abs region through very effective abs contraction and extension thus to promote better digestion. Also via inverted posture your brain will gain a fresh blood supply to be totally refreshed and to better function.The 30-min training is suitable for everyone to enjoy an all-around body building exercises especially in summer time. The 45-min is a relatively challenging session including inverted postures which might be preferred by intermediate yogis to get more benefits.

reviews.title: The bezt
reviews.comment: thanks guys. Using it everyday. To open the app you need to download the daily yoga all in one. That app is the platform for opening all the other sessions they have.
reviews.author: Vy Nguyen

reviews.title: So disappointed
reviews.comment: Can\'t find app once installed even though downloading was successful...uninstalling now!
reviews.author: DeAndra Robinson

reviews.title: Can\'t pay with Google play g.c.?
reviews.comment: I am so disappointed that I cannot pay for pro using a Google Play gift card.   Why is my only option to pay is with a credit/debit card that is linked to my Google Play account?  I wish that this was stated anywhere on your play store description.  Weary to attach credit or a debit card to my Google account because of the risk of unauthorized payments. Free apps still good.
reviews.author: Courtney Rhodes

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app! The best way to saving your money from joining yoga classes. :)

reviews.author: Yamam Saheb

reviews.title: Very good but...
reviews.comment: Another excellent yoga app from this developer. My only criticism is that it comes up as a free download in the Play store, & downloads quite happily, but then will not \"unlock\" unless you pay a subscription. Granted, the fee is very good value, but it would be good to know *before* the download
reviews.author: A Google User
